thread.title: Julia Louis-Dreyfus’ son is a Northwestern basketball walk-on
thread.title_full: Julia Louis-Dreyfus’ son is a Northwestern basketball walk-on | New York Post

author: Jonathan Lehman
title: Julia Louis-Dreyfus’ son is a Northwestern basketball walk-on
text:
Get out!
Charlie Hall, the son of actress Julia Louis-Dreyfus of “Seinfeld” and “Veep” fame, is a freshman walk-on for the Northwestern basketball team.
The 6-foot-5 guard, a Northwestern double legacy, got the height gene from father Brad Hall. He averaged 15.3 points, 11 rebounds and five assists per game during his final season at the Los Angeles private school Crossroads, which produced ex-NBA players Baron Davis and Austin Croshere and a litany of Hollywood boldfacers. Hall also played for Earl Watson Elite on the AAU circuit.
Here’s Hall’s highlight reel — check out the lefty shooting stroke:
